# Replace Any Types with Proper Interfaces

## ðŸŸ¡ Medium Priority

### Summary
Multiple files use `any` types, losing type safety.

### Implementation
Create proper interfaces:
```typescript
// types/rfp.ts
export interface RFPDocument {
  id: string;
  sections: RFPSection[];
}

export interface RFPSection {
  id: string;
  title: string;
  questions: RFPQuestion[];
}

// Replace: rfpDocument: any
// With:    rfpDocument: RFPDocument
```

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Define all missing interfaces
- [ ] Replace Record<string, any>
- [ ] Enable noImplicitAny
- [ ] Fix all type errors

### Estimated Effort
4-5 hours
